name: MOVIE_GURU__SEARCH_MOVIE
description: Searches for movies by title and returns a list of matching results with summary information.

title.description: The title of the movie to search for (e.g., 'Inception').

limit.description: The maximum number of search results to return. Defaults to 5.

name: MOVIE_GURU__GET_MOVIE_DETAILS
description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific movie, with optional info sets (e.g., plot, cast, technical).

movie_id.description: The IMDb ID of the movie, which is the number part of the URL (e.g., '0133093' for The Matrix).

info_sets.description: Optional list of IMDb info sets to fetch (e.g., ['main', 'plot', 'keywords']). Defaults to ['main'].

name: MOVIE_GURU__GET_TOP_250_MOVIES
description: Fetches a list of the highest-rated movies from the official IMDb Top 250 chart, with fallback to the Popular 100 if needed.

limit.description: The number of movies to return from the top of the list. Defaults to 10.

name: MOVIE_GURU__GET_UPCOMING_MOVIES
description: Fetches a list of upcoming movies (proxied via IMDbâ€™s popular 100 list).

limit.description: The maximum number of upcoming movies to return. Defaults to 10.
